divs: Sighting DetailsOnce the clouds cleared you could see it hover down then launch so quick that it left light in the mist as it shot strait up it couldn't be tracked once it moved So fast the light its self was so bright you couldn't miss it. I walked my dog near the woods I yelled for here to get over near me I could Hear super fast runing I came back and sit down that is when The four us us seen it launch off or warp I don't know. It was so amazing.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pevely
There were no other sightings in Pevely on or around July 26th 2012
